string-array.name: cancellation_policy_description
string-array.item: Users will receive a full refund, excluding ParkHere fee (10%), if cancellation occurs 24 hours or more before rental period.\n Users will receive no refund if their cancellation occurs less 24 hours before the rental period.\n Users who leave early will receive a refund for the hours not spent in the space 24 hours after their cancellation.

Users will receive a full refund, excluding ParkHere fee (10%), if cancellation occurs five days or more before rental period.\n Users will receive a refund for 50% of the rental fees for the entire rental period excluding the first 24 hours.\n Users who leave early will receive a refund for 50% of the hours not spent in the space 24 hours after their cancellation.
Users will receive a 50% refund if cancellation occurs seven days or more before rental period.\n If the user cancels less than 7 days in advance of the rental period, no value will be refunded.
